titleStmt.title: The Humble petition of the inhabitants of the county of Essex to His Majesty with His Maiesties gracious answer thereunto : also, the petition presented by the inhabitants of the afore said county to both houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
